text: is a Japanese baseball team in Sendai, Miyagi Prefecture. The Eagles play in Japan's .Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB), "Teams (Rosters, Schedules/Scores, Individual Stats); retrieved 2012-7-17. ==History== *Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles (2005~) The owner of the Eagles is Rakuten, an IT company. The Eagles are very popular in Miyagi. The mascot character is Clutch and Clutchyna. And in 2016, Switch was added to them. The Eagles became the champion of the Pacific League on September 26, 2013. Masahiro Tanaka contributed to becoming the champion. He won 24 games in the 2013 series. In the Japan Series, the Eagles had four wins and three losses to Yomiuri Giants, who became the champion of Central League in Japan. ==Home stadium== The Rakuten Seimei Park Miyagi in Sendai is their home stadium. This stadium is in the central ward of Sendai city, near .Kleenex Statium Miyagi at JapaneseBaseballStadiums.com ; retrieved 2012-12-18. ==References== == Other websites== * Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles webpage Category:Baseball teams in Japan Category:Sports organizations in Sendai, Miyagi
title: Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles
